document.full_text: china on tuesday played down a united nations report that pointed to it as a trans-shipment point for banned missile technology and other illicit trade between north korea and iran.
document.title: china plays down u.n. report on north korea, iran proliferation
lines_and_colors: china on tuesday played down a united nations report that pointed to it as a trans-shipment point for banned missile technology and other illicit trade between north korea and iran.
